product_name: Hoka One One Kailua Tarmac Road-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ideal shoes for runners looking for light weight, responsiveness and performance cushioning, the women's Hoka One One Kailua Tarmac Road-Running Shoes offer good traction and a fast feel. EVA midsoles feature foam that is 30% softer than traditional running shoe foam, and 2.5 times more voluminous; this extra cushioning dissipates shock from heel striking. Meta-Rocker midsole geometery is engineered with a low heel-to-toe differential that encourages efficient running mechanics; 5mm heel-to-toe drop. Lightweight, seamless breathable mesh uppers allow good airflow to keep your feet cool. Active Foot Frame midsole geometry allows the feet to sink into the shoes as opposed to sitting on top to provide great feedback to the feet while you're running. Hoka One One Kailua Tarmac Road- Running Shoes have high-abrasion, lightweight rubber traction zones for grip on roads and sidewalks. Closeout.
short_description: The ideal shoes for runners looking for light weight, responsiveness and performance cushioning, the women's Hoka One One Kailua Tarmac Road-Running Shoes offer good traction and a fast feel.
